summary: The utils package supplies a comprehensive set of reusable helper functions for the simulation tools, covering file and directory manipulation, URL processing, logging support, configuration validation, YAML/JSON I/O, geometric transformations (including radial conversion and coordinate rotation with Astropy units), standardized naming and identifier generation, and robust value parsing with unit handling.
business_intent: Enable consistent, error‑free handling of common tasks across the simulation workflow, reducing code duplication and simplifying development of higher‑level components.
